name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A live wallpaper of the Nissan GTR R35 surrounded by neon lights.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser with the dynamic style of a Nissan GTR R35 immersed in vibrant neon lights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your Chrome to life with this extension! Enjoy a beautiful street view with Nissan gtr 35, complemented by a search bar, shortcuts to popular sites, and up-to-date date and time information. We wish you a delightful experience with our extension!
